properties.areaDesc: Hancock, TN; Claiborne, TN; Grainger, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 5:08AM EST until February 10 at 4:36AM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers ...

Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Hancock and Scott
Counties
Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Claiborne...Grainger and
Hancock Counties
Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Hancock and Lee Counties
Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Claiborne and Union Counties

Moderate to heavy rain will persist across the area through today,
causing several rivers to exceed flood stage today.

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Clinch River Above Tazewell TN.
* From early this morning until late Sunday night.
* At 03:30 AM Thursday the stage was 10.7 feet and rising.
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by early this morning and
continue to rise to near 15.8 feet by tomorrow early afternoon. The
river will fall below flood stage by Sunday before midnight.
* At 16.0 feet...Extensive flooding of pasture land around Grissom
Island occurs. The city of Tazewell, Tennessee is not affected by
flooding of the Clinch River.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
